name: Start With No Game
description:
Web edition is now available! Start With No Game

The game where there is no game, so you'll just have to make due making your own. Sorry!

Taking the theme to its literal extreme for game jams, the game itself is missing a game!

It's up to you to build it yourself! With very limited options!

Instructions:

Point and click to create objects.
WASD and space keyboard commands also exist, but you'll have to put them in yourself if you want to use them.

Credits:

Built in Unity3D by David Newel

Using generated sounds from Bfxr:
https://www.bfxr.net/

And Using the Atari ST 8x16 system font, provided here:
https://www.dafont.com/atari-st-8x16-system-font.font
